rules.name: Rule #0
rules.title: Respect other people
rules.description:
- Don't, negligently or deliberately, cause others to have a bad site experience
- Don't support efforts to cause harm to others, especially discriminatory hate or violent acts
- This rule applies to all content posted on the site, including images, comments, forum posts, and private messages
rules.example:
- Posting inflammatory comments in forums or on images
- Insulting someone
- Calling for violence against someone

rules.name: Rule #1
rules.title: Respect content ownership
rules.description:
- Don't post others' non-commercial content without a reasonable belief they would be okay with it
- Don't post commercial content without permission or a copyright exemption
- Don't post content with authorship marks removed, unless you have permission
- Don't post content identified in the Do-Not-Post list
rules.example:
- Uploading private content without permission
- Uploading full movies
- Uploading AI upscaled versions of art without permission

rules.name: Rule #2
rules.title: Tag images appropriately
rules.description:
- Don't apply tags to an image unless their definition, or common sense meaning if there isn't one, matches what's in the image
- Don't remove such tags
- Don't change tags set by site staff, or important tags such as authorship or rating, without extra diligence
rules.example:
- Tagging your upload `tagme`
- Tagging an explicit image as `safe`
- Not tagging anthro on an image containing an anthropomorphic character
- Removing a tag set by site staff
- Removing the `artist:xyz` tag from an image you didn't create

rules.name: Rule #3
rules.title: Only post artwork appropriate for the site's subject
rules.description:
- Don't post images where no part is related to the site's subject
- Don't post images with minimal artistic effort and meaning
- Don't post images where minimal alterations have been made to make something related to the site's subject
rules.example:
- Posting abstract art when the site is focused on a specific fandom
- Posting photographs of real-life objects unrelated to the site's theme
- Posting unrelated memes with a small amount of alterations and no artistic effort

rules.name: Rule #4
rules.title: Use filters to hide content you don't wish to see
rules.description:
- Don't post comments complaining about an image's subject matter (filters can help)
- Don't vote on images based on filterable characteristics
- Don't accuse others of rule-breaking (report instead)
- Filter content which you cannot legally view
rules.example:
- Commenting "I hate anthro"
- Commenting "This is disgusting" on images you could have filtered out
- Commenting about content breaking the rules instead of reporting it
- Downvoting every image from a certain artist because you dislike the artist

rules.name: Rule #5
rules.title: Keep content legal
rules.description:
- Don't post real-life pornography of underage people or sexual acts with animals, or anything not readily distinguishable from it
- Don't post defamation or libel
- Don't incite violence against people, or dehumanize them
- Don't call for oppression of people by their characteristics (such as race, sex, sexuality, or cultural/national/religious background)
- Don't post extremist content or symbols in any way that promotes them
rules.example:
- Uploading an illegal photograph
- Uploading art depicting a realistic human-like underage character in a sexual scenario
- Uploading content that defames a real person
- Uploading content that promotes hate groups or extremist ideologies, such as Nazi symbolism

rules.name: Rule #6
rules.title: Do not abuse site functionality
rules.short_description: Spam, off-topic, or general site abuse
rules.description:
- Don't use multiple accounts to evade punishments or to pretend to be two different people in the same discussion
- Don't impersonate others
- Don't upload many images in a short time unless they are meaningfully distinct parts of an image set
- Don't create multiple comments/posts in a row when you can edit instead
- Don't post comments or thread replies unrelated to the subject
- Don't post unsolicited advertisement
rules.example:
- Using an alt account while your main account is banned
- Uploading an image just to say "Remember to stay hydrated"
- Commenting "nice" on an image without any other content
- Posting links to other websites without context or permission
- Posting a comment about politics on an image unrelated to politics

rules.name: Rule #7
rules.title: Spoiler content which cannot be filtered
rules.description:
- Respect the sexual rating of where you post. Forum threads' are assumed to be within SFW ratings unless specified otherwise
- Within text posts, use the `||spoiler syntax||` to spoiler above-rating or potentially-seizure-inducing content that built-in site functionality cannot automatically filter
- Parts of your profile that cannot use spoiler syntax, such as username and avatar, must be within SFW ratings and not contain flickering animations which may induce seizures
rules.example:
- Posting explicit content in a general discussion topic
- Writing an above-rating description on an image without spoiler tags
- Using porn as your avatar

rules.name: Rule #8
rules.title: Respect privacy
rules.description:
- Do not reveal any personal information about artists or other users without consent
- If you are aware of an artist or a user using multiple aliases to separate their work, do not reveal this information publicly without their consent
rules.example:
- Commenting "Oh I know this artist, it's X!" on an image tagged "anonymous artist"
- Disclosing someone's real name, address, or other personal information without their consent

rules.name: Rule #9
rules.title: Advertise commissions in good faith
rules.description:
- All commissions must contain only the artwork created by the person advertising the commission
- You may not advertise a commission on behalf of another person
- Site staff are not responsible for any commission arrangements or outcomes based on commission advertisements
rules.example:
- Posing other people's art as your own in a commission advertisement
- Advertising a commission for another artist without their permission
- Misrepresenting your commission terms

rules.name: Rule #n
rules.title: Rules are not exhaustive
rules.description:
- The rules are not exhaustive; just because something is not explicitly forbidden does not mean it is allowed
- If you are unsure whether something is allowed, contact site staff for clarification
